comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content:
There was an R. E. Baker credited with directing a bunch of silent pictures in 1911, including "The Gordian Knot," "His Friend's Wife," "The Rosary," "Her Dad, the Constable," "Fate's Funny Frolic," "The Burglarized Burglar," and "The New Manager," all starring Francis X. Bushman. 

But it's a pretty common surname, and "R. E." could stand for a lot of things....
